name: マイクタイソン・パンチアウト!!
summary:
Punch-Out!! (パンチアウト!! ), originally released in North America as Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!!, is a boxing sports fighting video game for the NES developed and published by Nintendo in 1987. It is a port of both the Punch-Out!! and Super Punch-Out!! arcade games (mostly the latter) with some variations. 
Before the public release of Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!!, Nintendo released the game in a gold-colored Famicom cartridge simply titled Punch-Out!! in Japan, without Mike Tyson in it, as a prize for the Golf U.S. Course Famicom Tournament in September 1987.
Nintendo later released Punch-Out!! to the public as the Mike Tyson version in Japan.
